typedef Vector4 Colour4
 A colour contain four values, red, green, blue and alpha.

Detailed Description

Structure to hold a vector contain four values.

Used to define interaction in 4D, and used to represent a colour with a alpha (r,g,b,a)

union { ... }

Real chain::Vector4::a

Colour data interface.

Alpha value of vector, equal to Vector4::w

Real chain::Vector4::b

Colour data interface.

Blue value of vector, equal to Vector4::z

Real chain::Vector4::g

Colour data interface.

Green value of vector, equal to Vector4::y

Real chain::Vector4::m_data[4]

Array data interface.

Array to access all four values

Real chain::Vector4::r

Colour data interface.

Red value of vector, equal to Vector4::x
